channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Aaron Paul Won’t Return to ‘Invincible’ Because Powerplex Was So Dark
item.description: Any 'Invincible' fans looking forward to more Powerplex will see him again, he just won't have Aaron Paul's voice anymore.

item.title: Black Friday Week : les tablettes Apple, Samsung, Lenovo sont enfin à portée de main
item.description: Le marché des tablettes tactiles connaît depuis quelques mois un net regain. Un retour en force que l'on doit notamment aux fabricants chinois et à leurs modèles à prix cassé. Ceux-ci s'avèrent encore plus intéressants pendant la Black Friday Week, tout comme les modèles plus haut de gamme chez Apple et Samsung ou encore Microsoft.

item.title: Apple just unveiled its official Black Friday deal for the iPhone 17 - it's typically Apple
item.description: Apple's annual gifting event is back and the latest iPhone 17 series are included.

item.title: 16 Best Air Purifiers (2025): Coway, AirDoctor, IQAir
item.description: Protect your home against dust, pets, allergies, and more with air purifiers tested firsthand by WIRED.

item.title: J’ai roulé 24 heures en Rolls-Royce Spectre : récit d’une expérience hors du commun
item.description: La Rolls-Royce Spectre est la première voiture électrique de l’histoire de la marque. Nous avons pu passer 24 heures en sa compagnie, de quoi s’apercevoir que cette motorisation convient très bien aux valeurs de luxe et de confort prônées depuis toujours par les modèles ornés du Spirit of Ecstasy. Récit.

item.title: Sony’s last-gen XM4 headphones are over 50 percent off for Black Friday
item.description: More than five years after making their debut, Sony’s WH-1000XM4 remain an excellent pair of noise-canceling headphones. And right now, Best Buy is offering a doorbuster deal that drops them to just $159.99 ($190 off) for a limited time, which is the lowest price we’ve seen this year. If you prefer the latest tech, you […]

item.title: Exploring how service management is now a key asset in elite sport
item.description: A look at how football clubs can enhance their internal operations.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Monday, November 24 (game #897)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Monday, November 24 (game #1400)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: Why some people are treating ChatGPT like a God – and what that means for the future of faith
item.description: AI isn’t just answering questions anymore. It’s becoming a source of comfort, meaning, and even spiritual guidance – and religions are already considering how to deal with it.

item.title: Vine walked so TikTok could run
item.description: What are thooooose? Well, they're my Vines, the six-second videos that helped mint a generation of famous comedians and also kicked off the era of endlessly looping vertical video that has consumed us all ever since. If you weren't there at the time, most Vines might seem utterly nonsensical. But if you were on the […]

item.title: This high-end Logitech headset has a huge 30% Black Friday discount – I’ve never seen it hit a lower price
item.description: I wasn’t expecting this huge 30% Black Friday discount on the Astro A50 X – but boy do I want it.

item.title: La Black Friday Week est aussi sur l’audio : écouteurs, casques et enceintes, voici les 15 meilleurs deals du moment
item.description: La Black Friday Week, c'est parti ! Amazon joue sa partition toute la semaine avec de grosses réductions sur les produits audio. Écouteurs et casques sans fil, enceintes et barres de son voient leurs prix chuter, toutes marques confondues.

item.title: The 73 Best Deals From REI’s 2025 Holiday Sale
item.description: The company that wants you to #optoutside for Black Friday is having its sale early. Gear up for next year with these great deals on packs, sleeping bags, merino wool, and more.

item.title: A new Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra rumor hints at a battery upgrade for the premium flagship phone
item.description: The latest rumor around the Galaxy S26 Ultra suggests the battery capacity will go up to 5,200 mAh.

item.title: Le Sonos Ace, aka le meilleur casque audio de 2024, perd 40 % de son prix pendant le Black Friday
item.description: Pour sa première incursion dans le monde des casques audio Bluetooth, Sonos a frappé fort avec son Ace hyper abouti, équilibré et bourré de technologies. Celui qu'on a qualifié de meilleur modèle l'an dernier est affiché à 299 euros au lieu de 499 euros sur Amazon, en pleine Black Friday Week.

item.title: 30+ best tech deals from the Currys Black Friday sale – an expert's top offers on TVs, laptops, appliances, and more
item.description: Here are over 30 of the best deals from the Currys Black Friday sale, hand-picked by a bargain-hunting expert.

item.description: Shopping for USB Flash Drive deals this Black Friday? Find your perfect removable storage in my guide

item.title: Did an AI war just get one step closer? Putin confirms Russia is planning its own national AI taskforce
item.description: Russia establishes a national AI taskforce to strengthen domestic LLMs, deploy humanoid robots, and develop autonomous drones for strategic operations.

item.title: Le télescope James-Webb révèle une spectaculaire fabrique de poussière au cœur d’un système stellaire unique
item.description: Parmi le bestiaire des étoiles insolites et remarquables, les astronomes connaissent celles qui furent découvertes en 1867 par Charles Wolf et Georges Rayet, de l'Observatoire de Paris. Les étoiles de Wolf-Rayet exploseront en supernovae, donnant parfois des sursauts gamma et des trous noirs....

item.title: The router wars are heating up - TP-Link says "smear campaign" by Netgear painted it as US national security risk
item.description: TP-Link is suing Netgear over false claims linking its routers to Chinese state-backed cyberattacks, alleging reputational damage and contract violations.

item.title: 11 Best MagSafe Wallets (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: These convenient and slim magnetic wallets are the ones you’ll want to stick to the back of your smartphone.

item.title: How to watch Arsenal vs Tottenham live streams: TV channels and preview for North London Derby
item.description: We'll show you all the ways to watch Arsenal take on Tottenham in the Premier League from anywhere in the world.

item.title: Robin Hood episode 5 highlights the biggest problem I have with the MGM+ show, but the showrunners think it’s ‘grounded’
item.description: Steamy scenes have been a regular feature in the MGM+ series Robin Hood, but episode 5 kicks things up a notch. I'm not a fan, but the creators are convinced it's 'grounded'.
